title: cant lock in my champion
body: I queue for a rank game, select my champ, game goes to banning phase and then i cant click the ban button. The game automatically bans the champ i selected at the end of the timer, cool. I go to picking phase, try to lock in, the button is greyed out.  I try click on something else, it says 'there was an error selecting your champion'. Happened twice in a row, got a free 30 minute dodge timer. Already reported it, are there any quick fixes because i couldnt find any off google.

replies.body: Sorry for the late response- If you're still having issues, try the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and let me know how it goes!
